'''Show Me the Mora''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Butter Chicken]] with [[Dori]]. The recipe for Butter Chicken is obtainable from [[Effendi]] for reaching Reputation Level 1 in [[Sumeru]].

'''Show Me the Mora''' increases the party's attack by '''274''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
